${ModID}:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
DESCRIPTIONS: At #b%s or more stacks, double the damage of the next Attack and lose #b%s stacks.

${ModID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted or #yAmplified, gain #b%s #yCharge #yUp.

${ModID}:EarthlightRay.NAME: Earthlight Ray
DESCRIPTIONS: After you gain #yCharge #yUp, deal damage equal to its total to ALL enemies.
After you gain #yCharge #yUp, deal damage equal to its total times #b%s to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BuildingCharge.NAME: Building Charge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain #b%s #yCharge #yUp.

${ModID}:StardustReverie.NAME: Stardust Reverie
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExhaust the next card you play to gain #b%s #yCharge #yUp and draw #b1 card.
